title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.7 - Payment of tolls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.7 - Payment of tolls

State Regulations

No vehicle shall cross the bridges or tunnels without the
payment of the toll prescribed by the Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority at
the regularly established places for the collection of such
tolls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
